summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing purchase of certain property in Pratt's Orchard 2nd Addition, Pratt's Orchard Addition, Gatch Addition, & Government Lot 5, Section 30, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W.M., for park purposes, from the National Bank of Commerce of Seattle as Trustee under agreement with Werner H. Kracke, providing for a note and mortgage to secure the unpaid balance of the purchase price, and for initial and deferred installment payments thereon. (Queen Anne Hill Viewpoint)
